list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the state of the atmosphere at a place and time as regards heat, dryness, sunshine, wind, rain, etc.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: if the weather's good we can go for a walk
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Nếu thời tiết tốt, chúng ta có thể đi dạo

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: wear away or change the appearance or texture of (something) by long exposure to the air.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: his skin was weathered almost black by his long outdoor life
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Da anh ta bị phong hóa gần như đen bởi cuộc sống ngoài trời dài của mình

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the sturdy boat had weathered the storm well
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chiếc thuyền chắc chắn đã vượt qua cơn bão tốt

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: make (boards or tiles) overlap downward to keep out rain.
allow (a hawk) to spend a period perched in the open air.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I would advise to weather her in her hood
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi sẽ khuyên bạn nên tiết kiệm cho cô ấy trong mui xe của cô ấy
